Input: I would like a way to generate a route along all important landmarks within a city.
I would like to explore a new city, and at the moment I would have to search for these landmarks myself and insert them into Maps. It would be nicer if this could be done automatically.
I would like a way to increase the size of street names without having to zoom in.
I do not want to zoom in and lose overview, but I have difficulty reading the street names.
I would like a visualisation of the areas where I have not been yet.
So I can explore new locations.
I would like an option to see which streets do or do not allow cars.
I like to bring my dog along on trips, so I need to know which streets do not allow cars, so my dog doesn't get scared.
I would like a way to plot a route that avoids busy intersections and traffic lights.
These intersections and lights slow me down when I'm traveling by bike.
